headline: This Week In Digital Payment - Revolutionizing Payment Security: AI and Tokenisation Lead Charge
summary: Juniper Research has highlighted three transformative technologies poised to revolutionize digital payment fraud and security over the coming year: civic identity apps, tokenisation, and artificial intelligence. Civic identity apps are expected to streamline onboarding processes and improve user control over digital identities. Tokenisation is anticipated to enhance efficiency through faster settlement speeds and reduced compliance burdens, while AI continues to innovate with adaptive...

headline: Prediction: PayPal Beats Earnings On Feb 3rd and Will Hit $90 Soon
summary: Shares of PayPal (NASDAQ:PYPL) have flipped from very bearish to bullish over two weeks. The digital payments company has been dismissed, many times, as a value trap after its 77% decline over five years. But with sentiment scores climbing from 12 (very bearish) on January 11th to 72 (bullish) by January 23rd, retail investors are ... Prediction: PayPal Beats Earnings On Feb 3rd and Will Hit $90 Soon
